```{r}
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
library(tsibble)
library(tibble)
library(zoo)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
datos <- read_excel("Gasto.xlsx", sheet = 2)
```

```{r}
datos$Date <- as.Date(datos$Date)
```

```{r}
datos <- as_tsibble(datos, index = Date)
datos
```

# Estimación de modelos

```{r}
datos_fit <- datos |> 
  model(
    media = MEAN(Expense),
    naive = NAIVE(Expense),
    snaive = SNAIVE(Expense),
    drift = RW(Expense ~ drift())
  )
datos_fit
```
# Análisis de residuos

```{r}
datos_fit |> 
  augment()

datos_fit |> 
  augment() |> 
  features(.innov, ljung_box, lag = 10, dof = 0)
```

## Media

```{r}
#| warning: false
datos_fit |> 
  select(media) |> 
  gg_tsresiduals()
```


# Forecast

```{r}
#| warning: false

datos_fc <- datos_fit |> 
  forecast(h = "15 days")

datos_fc

datos_fc |> 
  autoplot(datos) + 
  facet_wrap(~.model) + 
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
